snippet.title: Resident Evil 3 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Resident Evil 3 comes to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC beginning April 3rd, 2020! Return to Raccoon City as Jill Valentine escapes an unstoppable pursuer in this re-imagining of the survival horror classic.

For more official news and updates, follow us on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/RE_Games
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/residentevil/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/re_games/
